name: Pestilence Stirs
description:
In preparation for the final release, the download for the game jam version of Pestilence Stirs has been removed. Thank you for playing!

Story:

A terrible plague has swept the Kingdom of Rairus, adding to its woes with an ongoing war and famine. William is a doctor sent by the King to cure the plague from the people important to the King. Along the way, he begins to question his duty...

Gameplay:

Cure the plague by battling maladies! Purge the plague-causing Miasmas and evil spirits! Use historical medical methods like leeches, potions of crushed up emeralds, and more!

Info:

Made for the "RPG Maker Jam 3" game jam, with the theme "Contagious".

Currently incomplete, due to a miscalculation of time. The only things left are a couple of maps and the eventing of some cutscenes. It is still possible to see how the rest of the game plays out, through a theater-like setting.

I also need to loop the music, and add a bit more variety to combat. With more time, I would fill up the world. 

At the moment, it is pretty empty, especially on the mapping side.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement

Z/X - Confirm, Cancel

Shift - Dash
